company.name: Glossi
company.description: Generate unlimited product images and videos without ever compromising your brand.

timeline.title: 2 Years with Enterprise
timeline.description: Built and refined Glossi alongside Crate & Barrel, HOKA, and other major brands. Deep product-market fit.

timeline.title: AI Integration
timeline.description: Successfully shipped AI texturing, AI backgrounds, and world models that understand 3D space.

timeline.title: Sales Motion Started
timeline.description: Enterprise sales launched 3 months ago. $1.2M+ pipeline already. Strong early traction.

timeline.title: Seed Round
timeline.description: Raising to ramp sales and close pipeline. World models unlock the next wave of features.

pipeline.exploring: Building relationships with EY, PWC, KPMG, Deloitte, Accenture for enterprise distribution.

moat.title: 3D Pipeline Integration
moat.description: We work with actual 3D product data, not images. Deep integration with existing brand workflows.

moat.title: Enterprise Relationships
moat.description: Active pilots with major brands. Each integration deepens switching costs.

moat.title: Brand Trust Requirements
moat.description: Enterprise brands need reliability that 'good enough' AI can't deliver.

talkingPoints.title: The Problem is Real
talkingPoints.content: Current AI tools rebuild your product every time. Materials drift, proportions shift. It's not reliable enough for enterprise scale.

talkingPoints.title: Our Approach is Different
talkingPoints.content: We use 3D as the source of truth. The product is composited in, never generated. Pixel-perfect every time.

talkingPoints.title: We Have Traction
talkingPoints.content: $1.2M+ pipeline built in 3 months. Real conversations with real enterprise buyers who have real budgets.

talkingPoints.title: The Moat is Deep
talkingPoints.content: 3D pipeline integration, enterprise relationships, and brand trust requirements create compounding defensibility.

talkingPoints.title: Why Now
talkingPoints.content: We've spent 2 years building with enterprise. Sales motion just started. This is the inflection point.
